verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> also came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, thou <S%H3427>dwellest<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, which have <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> not; they have <S%H241>ears<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> not: for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.

Therefore, thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H6213>prepare<s%> thee <S%H3627>stuff<s%> for <S%H1473>removing<s%>, and <S%H1540>remove<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H1540>remove<s%> from thy <S%H4725>place<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>: it may be they will <S%H7200>consider<s%>, though they be a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>. stuff: or, instruments

Then shalt thou bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> thy <S%H3627>stuff<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>, as <S%H3627>stuff<s%> for <S%H1473>removing<s%>: and thou shalt go <S%H3318>forth<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>, as they that go <S%H4161>forth<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity<s%>. as they: Heb. as the goings forth of captivity
<S%H2864>Dig<s%> thou through the <S%H7023>wall<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>, and carry <S%H3318>out<s%> thereby. Dig: Heb. Dig for thee

In their <S%H5869>sight<s%> shalt thou <S%H5375>bear<s%> it upon thy <S%H3802>shoulders<s%>, and carry it <S%H3318>forth<s%> in the <S%H5939>twilight<s%>: thou shalt <S%H3680>cover<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%>, that thou <S%H7200>see<s%> not the <S%H776>ground<s%>: for I have <S%H5414>set<s%> thee for a <S%H4159>sign<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And I <S%H6213>did<s%> so as I was <S%H6680>commanded<s%>: I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H3627>stuff<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%>, as <S%H3627>stuff<s%> for <S%H1473>captivity<s%>, and in the <S%H6153>even<s%> I <S%H2864>digged<s%> through the <S%H7023>wall<s%> with mine <S%H3027>hand<s%>; I brought it <S%H3318>forth<s%> in the <S%H5939>twilight<s%>, and I <S%H5375>bare<s%> it upon my <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>. digged: Heb. digged for me
And in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, hath not the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H559>said<s%> unto thee, What <S%H6213>doest<s%> thou?

<S%H559>Say<s%> thou unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; This <S%H4853>burden<s%> concerneth the <S%H5387>prince<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that are <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

<S%H559>Say<s%>, I am your <S%H4159>sign<s%>: like as I have <S%H6213>done<s%>, so shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> unto them: they shall <S%H1473>remove<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%>. they: Heb. by removing go into captivity

And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> that is <S%H8432>among<s%> them shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> upon his <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> in the <S%H5939>twilight<s%>, and shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%>: they shall <S%H2864>dig<s%> through the <S%H7023>wall<s%> to carry <S%H3318>out<s%> thereby: he shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%>, <S%H3282>that<s%> he <S%H7200>see<s%> not the <S%H776>ground<s%> with his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

My <S%H7568>net<s%> also will I <S%H6566>spread<s%> upon him, and he shall be <S%H8610>taken<s%> in my <S%H4686>snare<s%>: and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>; yet shall he not <S%H7200>see<s%> it, though he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> there.

And I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> toward every <S%H7307>wind<s%> all that are <S%H5439>about<s%> him to <S%H5828>help<s%> him, and all his <S%H102>bands<s%>; and I will draw <S%H7324>out<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them.
And they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, when I shall <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them in the <S%H776>countries<s%>.

But I will <S%H3498>leave<s%> a <S%H4557>few<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of them from the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, from the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and from the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>; that they may <S%H5608>declare<s%> all their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> whither they <S%H935>come<s%>; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. a few: Heb. men of number
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came to me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H398>eat<s%> thy <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H7494>quaking<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> thy <S%H4325>water<s%> with <S%H7269>trembling<s%> and with <S%H1674>carefulness<s%>;

And <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H127>land<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; They shall <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H1674>carefulness<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> their <S%H4325>water<s%> with <S%H8078>astonishment<s%>, that her <S%H776>land<s%> may be <S%H3456>desolate<s%> from all that is <S%H4393>therein<s%>, because of the <S%H2555>violence<s%> of all them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein. all that: Heb. the fulness thereof

And the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> shall be laid <S%H2717>waste<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H8077>desolate<s%>; and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, what is that <S%H4912>proverb<s%> that ye have in the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H748>prolonged<s%>, and every <S%H2377>vision<s%> <S%H6>faileth<s%>?

<S%H559>Tell<s%> them therefore, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; I will make this <S%H4912>proverb<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%>, and they shall no more use it as a <S%H4911>proverb<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; but <S%H1696>say<s%> unto them, The <S%H3117>days<s%> are at <S%H7126>hand<s%>, and the <S%H1697>effect<s%> of every <S%H2377>vision<s%>.
For there shall be no more any <S%H7723>vain<s%> <S%H2377>vision<s%> nor <S%H2509>flattering<s%> <S%H4738>divination<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

For I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: I will <S%H1696>speak<s%>, and the <S%H1697>word<s%> that I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> shall come to <S%H6213>pass<s%>; it shall be no more <S%H4900>prolonged<s%>: for in your <S%H3117>days<s%>, O <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, will I <S%H1696>say<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%>, and will <S%H6213>perform<s%> it, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.
Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came to me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, behold, they of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H2377>vision<s%> that he <S%H2372>seeth<s%> is for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> to come, and he <S%H5012>prophesieth<s%> of the <S%H6256>times<s%> that are <S%H7350>far<s%> off.

Therefore <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; There shall none of my <S%H1697>words<s%> be <S%H4900>prolonged<s%> any more, but the <S%H1697>word<s%> which I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> shall be <S%H6213>done<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.
